commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And that concludes the camp report.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Come Together, Dream Together! That's a totally stellar slogan! It's like, nothing else would even fit!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It sounds like you all had your work cut out for you... Thank you so much for all your help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all! It was actually really fun.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup! We all had a blast. In fact, we were so hyped up, we wound up having a big pillow fight after we finished talking.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Just thinking back on it makes my nose ache again...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww, it sounds like you all had a lot of fun. I wish I could've stayed at a ryokan inn.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: The food was so delicious. It was a wonderful experience!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Uh-huh! The fish was so fresh, it took all of my willpower not to gobble it all up!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I wanna try it sometime too!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I liked the hot springs the best. I'd spend all day soaking in there if I could.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I am certain you would wind up passing out if you did.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww, guys! I'm so jealous! I wanna go next time!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, let's all go together next time!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I uploaded all of our plans to the website.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You always get the job done so quickly, Rinako.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I wonder what kind of response we'll get? I'm so nervous.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I hope everyone will be excited about it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Given that you all had so much fun deciding what to do, I'm certain we'll have a positive response.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yup. Fun is infectious.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You said it! Let's get gunnin' for some funnin'!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We made great progress in our discussions, the food was fantastic, and the hot springs felt amazing. It was truly a weekend to remember.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What did the rest of you do this weekend?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I sang some karaoke with my friends.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I spent my time reading through my backlog of novels.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The three of us hung out at Ikebukuro.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We also went to that anime shop you told us about, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, that's wonderful! I can't imagine a better way to spend the weekend! What did you think?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We found the novel for that anime you like so much.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The beautiful cover was enough to capture our interest.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Could you tell us about it? Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Of course! Oh, but how do I explain? The novel came first, but there's a manga for it too, and the anime is a prequel to the novel... Oh, I don't even know where to start!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...Um, whatever you do, put it in layman's terms.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We also went to the aquarium.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: All those penguins and otters were just adorable.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh yeah! Then, we spotted Nico, Rin, and Hanayo and decided to stalk... Er, I mean, we decided to see a school idol show with them!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? How was it?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It was fun. I'd never seen this group before, but it was quite exhilarating and a great learning experience.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: For sure! It really made me want to step up my game!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It was a great live show.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If the opportunity ever arose, I would love to watch them perform again sometime.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I wanna go see other school idol shows too. I bet there are all sorts of amazing groups out there and I need to see them all! It'll help me be even cuter than ever!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That really is quite the coincidence that you wound up bumping into Nico and the others, though.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh yeah, and speaking of coincidences, we ran into Shioriko Mifune after that too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You ran into Mifune?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Indeed. As it turns out...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow, that's a crazy story.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The kids were all over her, and she had a smile on her face the whole time.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I never would have thought she had that kind of side to her.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I just can't imagine that she's a bad person after seeing that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Maybe she's only touchy over school idols?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm not sure, myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want to find out more about her. If we want her to accept school idols, we're going to have to figure out why she thinks they're so pointless.
